roleset.name: fight a duel, battling one-on-one

example.name: adjective
example.text: And it 's a case of dueling realities.

example.name: all duelers in arg0
example.text: I was hoping for dueling between members of rival street gangs .
example.arg: between members of rival street gangs

example.name: args 0 and 2
example.text: Sen. Frank Murkowski and environmental groups on Wednesday continued their dueling over the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge, with Murkowski citing polls showing a majority of Americans now favor oil drilling there and his opponents saying it?s wrong to cast the area as an antidote to rising oil prices.
example.arg: over the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge,

roleset.note: DUEL-V NOTES: Frame created by Arrick based on ebc. Member of VNcls battle-36.4-1 (from duel.01-v)
DUELING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, duel.01. Corresponds to VNcls battle-36.4-1. (from dueling.01-n)
